duck: Devoted is the sequel to the New York Times bestselling novel Elixir by American entertainer Hilary Duff with Elise Allen.
devoted definition: characterized by loyalty and devotion.

(2013) }} 'Devoted' is the sequel to the [[New York Times]] bestselling novel [[Elixir (novel)|Elixir]] by American entertainer Hilary Duff with Elise Allen. It was published and released to booksellers on October 11, 2011. It is the second in a series of books that Duff is committed to do.
